verses.roman:
sāta dina paryanta aiche karena śravaṇe
bhāla-manda nāhi kahe, vasi' mātra śune

synonyms: sāta dina—seven days; paryanta—up to; aiche—in this way; karena—does; śravaṇe—hearing; bhāla—right; manda—wrong; nāhi—not; kahe—says; vasi'-sitting; mātra—only; śune—hears.
translation: Thus for seven days continually, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu listened to the Vedānta philosophy expounded by Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya. However, Caitanya Mahāprabhu did not say anything and did not indicate whether it was right or wrong. He simply sat there and listened to the Bhaṭṭācārya.
